bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Letter from Leatha Logan to [Philip Showalter Hench], February 22, 1942

div1.p: Logan thanks [Hench] for the photograph and agrees to send him more photographs.

div1.head: Letter from Leatha Logan to [Philip Showalter Hench], February 22, 1942
div1.opener:
Y. F,
Marion Indiana
Feb 22 - 1942,
Dr. Mench--
div1.p:
I happen to be four miles
from home on a rather
strennous pneumonia case
and won't likely be home
for at least a week but as
soon as I get home will
get the pictures started to
you.

Thank you so much for
the picture, It came to me
yesterday.

Will write you when
the pictures are posted.

closer.signed:
L. Logan
1505 - West Nelson St
Marion.
Indiana
